solution_line_template: After picking {oranges_tree1} oranges from the first tree and {oranges_tree2} oranges from the second tree, she has {oranges_tree1}+{oranges_tree2} = <<{oranges_tree1}+{oranges_tree2}={oranges_after_two_trees}>>{oranges_after_two_trees} oranges.

When she adds {oranges_tree3} more oranges from the third tree, she has {oranges_after_two_trees}+{oranges_tree3} = <<{oranges_after_two_trees}+{oranges_tree3}={total_oranges}>>{total_oranges} oranges.
